data.name: Mirror 2: Project X - Emoji
data.detailed_description:
6.23.2022 Added 16 emojis.

This is a free DLC that contains emojis of characters from Mirror 2: Project X. You can find them in the root folder of Mirror 2: Project X.
data.about_the_game:
6.23.2022 Added 16 emojis.

This is a free DLC that contains emojis of characters from Mirror 2: Project X. You can find them in the root folder of Mirror 2: Project X.
data.short_description: This is a free DLC that contains emojis of characters from Mirror 2: Project X. You can find them in the root folder of Mirror 2: Project X.
data.supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese, Japanese*, English, Traditional Chinese, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570K or AMD FX-8310
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
